name: sleepyhead
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person, especially a child, who is tired and looks as if they want to sleep: [ as form of address ] Come on, sleepyhead, let's get you to bed.

Animal physiology: sleep & sleeping

Add to word list
Add to word list
a person, esp. a child, who is tired and looks ready to sleep: Come on, sleepyhead, it’s time for bed.
